linking Disintegrating Night Walkers Scroll of Misty Step

Misty Step Tips & Notes for Baldur's Gate 3

Misty Step doesn't trigger Attack of Opportunity but can be Counterspell-ed. Misty Step can be used through anything you can see, including through transparent materials, prison cells, glass and much more, as along as there's something visible from the other side, you can use it to teleport past it, make sure you have enough spell slots for multiple Misty Steps otherwise you will get stuck in
